players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Wow, Bob was killed. This is getting intense quickly. We need to figure out who among us is the most suspicious."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's focus on identifying the most suspicious player among us. I don't have any concrete evidence yet, but I will keep observing everyone closely."

Charlie: "I believe we should focus on identifying the most suspicious player among us based on their actions and words during the game so far. Let's work together to gather more information and make an informed decision."
You: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems that one of us is hiding something. Let's continue to observe each other closely and share any suspicious observations or actions we notice."
Diana: "Charlie, you seem very focused on finding the suspicious player, but I haven't heard much from you yet. Do you have any insights to share with us?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
